column5: Well...the big guy can't be too far away from you, Drifter...drive down the road and knock on his door
That is one sweet looking machine.  I would ask for one,but I know I am only getting a chunck of coal this year.
if i had one i'd probably spend most of the time playing/looking at it, so i don't want one,....... bah humbug
NICE!  I want one of these..  mmmhhmmmm..  Queue Homer drooling..  HD
has anyone even seen a suggested retail $ on these. I've had a new FF on my XMAS list for 2 years now and see a  To Me  From Me  under the tree this year

Wanted a special book one year but I figured no one would think to buy it for me so I bought it, got the ladies at the mall to wrap it, and put it under the tree To Cliff,  from Santa.  For years my mom thought my wife had gotten it for me and my wife thought my mom had gotten it for me. They didn't find out until one day my mom commented on how much I used the book that Sue had gotten me and they realized that there had to have been another Santa that year LOL.
Hey they're almost the same price!!!!
WHAT????!!  And I thought I was being extravagant...   Funny, that's almost how much I have in my RRSPs...   Retirement.. or really sweet sonar..  The choice is obvious!  LOL
Yep, Really Sweet Sonar!!!! You can retire when you're dead!!!!
right now, the reel is a much better investment HD.  those new lowrance units really do look sharp.  price tags dulls my senses quickly tho.
